code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Card,Form,Button,Row,Col}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddItemForm=_ref=>{let{onAddItem}=_ref;const[itemName,setItemName]=useState('');const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(itemName.trim()&&quantity.trim()){onAddItem(itemName.trim(),quantity.trim());setItemName('');setQuantity('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Header,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"mb-0",children:"Add New Item"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form,{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"align-items-end",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:5,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{className:"mb-3 mb-md-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{className:"small",children:"Item Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",placeholder:"e.g., Milk, Eggs, Bread",value:itemName,onChange:e=>setItemName(e.target.value),required:true})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:3,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{className:"mb-3 mb-md-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{className:"small",children:"Quantity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",placeholder:"e.g., 2 kg, 1 liter",value:quantity,onChange:e=>setQuantity(e.target.value),required:true})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"success",className:"w-100",children:"+ Add Item"})})]})})})]});};export default AddItemForm;
